https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/n8D1gVXUgmW4kkDzUzzoezAmUUa.jpg The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered. Blood Simple
